data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of East Darfur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of East Darfur, Sudan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in East Darfur, Sudan.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary: On average, 33 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in East Darfur, Sudan.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of East Darfur.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of East Darfur who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Fulbe, Fulani people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, help the church in the state of East Darfur do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of East Darfur, Sudan. Please, stir the 1,567 believers here to pray for awakening.
Spirit, help every believer in East Darfur, Sudan be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.
